[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Sessions and Exercises” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/03/Training-planning.png” module_class=”blurb-list” _builder_version=”4.7.7″]

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Video Analytics” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/03/Video-analytics.png” module_class=”blurb-list” _builder_version=”4.7.7″]

Professional level video analytics made efficient and accessible to your teams, regardless of level.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.4.3″][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/11/AllInOneSmall.png” title_text=”AllInOneSmall” _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Statistics” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/03/Stats.png” module_class=”blurb-list” _builder_version=”4.7.7″]

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Management” image=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/03/Calendar.png” module_class=”blurb-list” _builder_version=”4.7.7″]

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Popup – #undefined” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ custom_margin=”-60px||-60px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/12/All-logos.png” alt=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” title_text=”Trusted by clubs from all over the world” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Popup – #undefined” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

One communication solution
for the entire organization

Communicate throughout the entire club with smart and fast messaging solutions tailored just for you. Write posts, chat, or send hundreds of notifications in an instant to all members of the club.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/11/Communication.png” alt=”Messaging, wall posts, and calendar” title_text=”Communication” show_bottom_space=”off” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”100%” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

Powerful
video analytics

Enable your teams to improve further with video analytics tools that are easy to use. Videos can be shared throughout the entire organization for all to see.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Popup – #undefined” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Share trainings and methodology
throughout the entire club

Browse over 100 created drills and sessions, or create your own and share them within your organization. Sending the right content to the right person has never been easier thanks to the Club, Team and Personal session libraries within 360Player.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/04/Club-Library.png” title_text=”Club Library” show_bottom_space=”off” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-10px” custom_margin_phone=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

Manage the entire club
in an efficient way

With 360Player it’s easy to check in or follow up with every team, coach and player in real time. Get an instant overview of what’s happening in your organization. You can also build custom structures tailored to your club to ensure the correct flow of information.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Help players and coaches
reach their full potential

Make sure that every individual in your club has goals to work towards, gets the feedback they need, and takes responsibility for their own development. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ts-uploads.azureedge.net/marketing/2020/11/PositionMatch-Small.png” title_text=”PositionMatch Small” show_bottom_space=”off” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ width=”69%” max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-10px” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”700ms” animation_intensity_slide=”14%” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”]

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Statistics that
generate insights

Get access to statistics from matches and trainings for every team in the club at a moments notice. 360Player is packed with a ton of useful statstics features. For example, track physical strain to prevent injuries, or minutes played to see that everyone gets enough time on the field.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Popup – #undefined” module_class=”padding-override” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”reverse” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(47,50,54,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Access all your favorite tools
in one convenient place

The 360Player platform has everything in one place including communication, session plans, statistics, individual development plans, video analytics, and much more!
